name: BawsInYoJaws v0.0.1
description:
Baws in yo jaws 2d platform shooter, 

controls:

press c to spawn the jaws

w or space to jump

while next to a wall, run into it to slide on it, then press spacebar to jump off it

press f to toggle slowmo

press a and d to run left and right

use scroll wheel or press 1 - 5 to change weapons

notes:

currently, sniper does 100 damage ar does 20 and the other guns do 50

so sniper is 1 shot and the rest are 2 shot

hitmarkers and some particle effects for hitting a jaw  will be implemented soon 

u are currently invincible and cannot die

IMPORTANT:

game runs fullscreen 800x600, if u alt tab, ur other screens will become 800x600, if u want to quit press ESCAPE
